mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ROLE, ID, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE, NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, BUSINESS_NO, BUSINESS_NAME, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, MEMBER_STATUS, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_GENDER ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{nickname}, #{profile_img}, #{business_no}, #{business_name}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{age}, #{gender} )
